result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. ADXEL GUERRA MARQUEZ

records.addlTxt: 9:05 AM Defendant ADXEL GUERRA MARQUEZ not in court.  Attorney Amaro Lopez not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Amanda Nash in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court orders bond forfeited.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing on September 7, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Allow 48 business hours for processing.  $35 warrant fee.

09:32 AM Attorney Amaro Lopez in court (via phone).  Adam Joseph Levin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE doesn't appear.  The DE has moved to FL and the phone # the attorney has is no longer a working #.  We do have John Vaughn here to interpret.  The Court notes there is no victim present that wishes to make a statement.  Bond Continues.  Record closed @ 9:34.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: 11:17 AM Attorney Amaro Lopez in court.  Amanda Lynn Folger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE doesn't appear, there was a voice mail left by the DE's Mother stating he went back to FL to work.  Attorney Lopez was just appointed, requests another FP date.  The Court does have an interpreter here today.  The Court will set another FP date.  Bond Continues.  The Court notes there is no victim present that wishes to make a statement.  Record closed @ 11:19.  Further proceedings scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Document incorrectly filed - should have been filed in Outagamie County Case No. 22CF102.

STALKING(DV), DC(DV)
CONDITIONS:   No contact with V1 in Menasha PD report #22-0679.   No contact with the 1000 block of Lucerne Drive Menasha.   No contact with Aspen Ridge Apartments in Menasha.   No contact with V1's children, A.S.F.H. dob 12/28/15 & A.A.G.H. dob 1/12/20.  Defendant does acknowledge they've been advised who the victim(s) is/are.

02:35 PM Defendant ADXEL GUERRA MARQUEZ in court with attorney Ben Szilagyi.  Defendant ADXEL GUERRA MARQUEZ in custody.  Margaret Jeanne Struve appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  ADXEL GUERRA MARQUEZ appeared by video means with Attorney.  John Vaughn sworn to interpret (via zoom).  Given/has complaint. Advised of charges & potential penalties.  The defendant authorized the Court to send text message reminders of upcoming court hearings.  The Court notes there is no victim present that wishes to make a statement.  Record closed @ 3:07.  Further proceedings scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 11:15 am.
faxed to Sheriff's Office for handout to DE with their copy of the criminal complaint.
